subject: BAE
title: Engineering Prin & Appl
info: engineering principles/concepts. students quantitatively apply mechanical/engineering principles to solve problems in animal production, crop production, horticulture, and soil/water management.

subject: BAE
title: Senior Design I
info: review of design concepts and process. case studies involving engineering design. discussion of safety/ethical issues. develop proposal for senior design project (individual or group) to be completed in 4122. oral presentation of written proposal.

subject: BAE
title: Senior Design II
info: complete design project started in 4112. report, poster, and oral presentation of final design.
